content: half_double_crochet whip stitch using mc at top of each into each st -14 sts remember to corner check your gauge after working row weave in all ends 9 row 16 is a rs row little washies keeping rs facing rotate work 90 with just one strand of yarn chain 15 degrees like you are turning a row 1 beginning with the 2nd chain from steering wheel to work along side hook and working into the bottom of edge divide side edge evenly in half the chain half_double_crochet into the next st slip_stitch by placing removable stitch marker at into the next st 7 times across row - halfway point work 10 single_crochet evenly 14 sts along side edge ending at stitch row 2-15 chain 1 turning chain does marker work another 10 single_crochet evenly not count as a stitch turn 1 half_double_crochet spaced along remainder of side edge into the next st 1 slip_stitch into the next ending at corner there are now 20 single_crochet st 7 times across row -14 sts evenly spaced along side edge rotate fasten_off weave in ends take the 90 degrees to work 1 single_crochet into each of time to weave them in securely- the next 14 sts from foundation row switch directions at least twice when rotate 90 degrees to work another 20 weaving them in this will help to single_crochet evenly spaced along next side edge keep ends in place with repeated rotate 90 degrees to work 1 single_crochet into washings ok now make a bazillion each of the next 14 sts there are more- you will need them now a total of 68 single_crochet sts around perimeter of bottom of basket do not fasten_off 3
